short_summary: One (1) Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) Specialist, Senior needed.
description: For the Department of National Defence (DND), there is a need for one (1) Senior Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) Specialist to support the Directorate of Aerospace equipment program management -- Maritime Helicopter Project (MHP). This resource will provide support services in areas of configuration management (CM), system safety (SS), and airworthiness (AW) documentation.
full_summary:
**Call for Proposal: Flagship Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) Services Contract**

**File Number:** W8470-TSPS2023-26
**Deadline: July 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for a one-year fixed-term contract, with the option to extend for two additional years, for the provision of Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) services.

**Background:**
The DND requires a Senior ILS Specialist to provide support services in the areas of Configuration Management, System Safety, and Airworthiness documentation for the Maritime Helicopter Project (MHP).

**Scope of Work:**
The successful bidder will be required to provide ILS services for 96 days per annum. The estimated duration of the contract is August 14, 2023 to August 13, 2024, with the option to extend for two additional years.

**Eligibility:**
This call for proposal is open only to pre-qualified suppliers listed below, who meet the specified consultant categories, level of expertise, security level, region, and tier:

1. 7351933 Canada Inc.
2. 9468269 Canada Corp.
3. Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
4. ACF Associates Inc.
5. ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
... (full list of 28 companies)

**Security Requirements:**

*   Supplier Security Clearance: FSC – Secret
*   Security Level: ASI – Secret
*   Document Safeguarding: None

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents:**

*   RFP documents will be emailed directly to pre-qualified suppliers.
*   Bidders should note that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.

**Enquiries and Contact Information:**

*   Enquiries should be addressed to Chantal Leavoy, DND Point of Contact, at chantal.leavoy@forces.gc.ca.
*   File Number: W8470-TSPS2023-26

**Method of Supply:**
The Task and Solutions Based Professional Services (TSPS) method is a result of a formal competitive process. Suppliers can become pre-qualified for future bidding opportunities by contacting Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

For more information on this and other PWGSC professional service methods of supply, or to register as a supplier, please visit: <https://buyandsell.gc.ca/for-business
